alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gosper and northeastern Furnas Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 742 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm a few miles north of Arapahoe, or 26 miles west of Holdrege, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Gosper and northeastern Furnas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
